price: O people, it is you who are in need of Allah, whereas Allah is the Self-Sufficient, the Praiseworthy.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
